Name: Suspending alternate side parking regulations on primary election day.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending alternate side parking regulations on primary election day.
Summary: The proposed local law would suspend alternate side parking regulations on primary election day.
Text:
Int. No. 634

By Council Members Treyger, Cabrera, Constantinides, Espinal, Gentile, Mendez, Rose, Dromm and Ulrich

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending alternate side parking regulations on primary election day.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Section 19-163 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new subdivision d to read as follows:
      d. The department shall suspend all alternate side of the street parking rules on the day a primary election is held.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment into law.


GZ/ket
10/16/2014
LS 2687
